settings.title: The Best Value for Money E-Scooter Under $2,000
Free Shipping
settings.content: Free shipping Australia-wide, including rural and remote areas

settings.title: Built for the Australian Terrain
settings.content: Engineered for Australian terrain and proven in real-world conditions, the Kaiju delivers the durability and reliability you need. From smooth city commutes to rugged adventures, we've got your journey covered.

settings.title: Tired of Broken Promises? So Were We.
settings.content: Founded by three young Aussies, The Simple Commute was started to fill a massive gap in the market for reliable e-scooters with genuine local support. We were tired of seeing riders left stranded by overseas companies with broken promises and non-existent service.

settings.title: That Sinking Feeling When Your Battery Dies? Not Anymore.
settings.content: You know the feeling. You're halfway to work and your scooter starts slowing down. That pit in your stomach as you realise you're about to be late, sweaty, and walking. The Kaiju's removable battery means you'll never feel that panic again. Swap batteries in 10 seconds and keep riding like nothing happened.

settings.title: Not Your Average Electric Scooter.
settings.content: Dual 2400W motors. Proper triple spring suspension. Heavy-duty frame.
5-star rated by riders who've tested it on Australia's toughest roads.

settings.author: Chris D.
settings.content: I reached out to The Simple Commute regarding the Kaiju Electric Scooter, and despite being located in Adelaide, I received absolutely exceptional customer service. The team was incredibly responsive, thoroughly answered all my questions, and took the time to discuss their products with genuine enthusiasm and expertise. Special thanks to Ben from The Simple Commute Melbourne for his outstanding support with my purchase.

settings.author: Darren B.
settings.content: The Simple Commute delivered an excellent experience that far exceeded my expectations. Lightning-fast responses to every question, outstanding after-sales service, and nothing was ever too much trouble. My Kaiju E-Scooter arrived quickly and in perfect condition. On my first ride, it effortlessly climbed my steep 20-degree driveway in first gear.

settings.author: Nathan J.
settings.content: As an Australian customer, I was thoroughly impressed with The Simple Commute's dedication to service excellence. The Kaiju e-scooter itself has exceeded all my expectations. It's an exceptional machine that delivers on both performance and quality. I'd confidently recommend the Kaiju to anyone considering an e-scooter purchase.

settings.title: Here's What Our Fans Have To Say
The Ultimate Adventure Companion
settings.content: The Kaiju combines 3600W of peak power, rugged all-terrain capability, and 100km range.

settings.title: Are your e-scooters legal to ride in Australia?
settings.content:
The legality of riding e-scooters in Australia varies by state and territory. In some places, e-scooters are permitted on roads and bike paths, while other areas may restrict their use to private property. AtÂ The Simple Commute, we recommend checking your local laws to ensure compliance with speed limits, helmet requirements, and road access rules.

Our e-scooters are designed to meet safety standards, making them suitable for regions where they are legal to ride. We always encourage responsible riding and staying informed about the latest regulations in your area.

settings.title: What is the warranty and how does it work?
settings.content:
We offer a Limited Warranty for 24 months from the date of purchase, covering defects in materials and workmanship. The warranty process involves contacting Customer Support with a description of the defect, proof of purchase, serial number, and relevant photos/videos. If the defect is covered, they will repair or replace the part at no cost to you.

Shipping costs for returning defective products are covered by us. The warranty does not cover damage caused by accidents, misuse, unauthorized repairs, normal wear and tear, or cosmetic damage. Key parts like the frame is covered for 2 years and battery is covered for 1 year.

settings.title: Do you offer servicing?
settings.content:
You can service your e-scooter by bringing it to The Simple Commute's repair center (8/1001 Mountain Highway, Boronia, Melbourne), any of our repair network partners or you can ship it to us.

Repair turnaround times vary based on the availability of spare parts, ranging from 3-5 days to a minimum of 30 days. For updates, you can reach out to The Simple Commute team.

settings.title: Do you offer in-store pickup and test rides?
settings.content: Yes, we offer local pickup and test rides at our Melbourne warehouse! Please get in touch with our team to arrange a time that suits you.

settings.title: FAQ
settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Sunday: 8am-8:30pm.
